title: Match of the Day - 13th September 2014 - HDTV X264
description:
SPORT: Match of the Day
On: BBC 1 HD  
Date: Saturday 13th September 2014 
Time: 23:00 to 00:35 

Gary Lineker introduces highlights from the Premier League, with fixtures including a crucial match as Arsenal host defending champions Manchester City. Last season, City famously beat the Gunners 6-3 at home before picking up a point at the Emirates Stadium to help them on their way to winning the title. The early evening game sees Liverpool face Aston Villa, with the Reds hoping to end the Villans' three-match unbeaten run at Anfield. Elsewhere, Chelsea play Swansea, Crystal Palace meet Burnley, Southampton host Newcastle, Stoke face Leicester, Sunderland take on Tottenham and West Brom play Everton.
Demonoid4Ever had kindly uploaded a 720p version :)
